casebody.data:
[Cite as 01/07/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-10.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 7, 2003

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

1999-1524. State v. Noling.

Portage App. No. 96-P-126. Reported at 98 Ohio St.3d 44, 2002-Ohio-7044, 781 N.E.2d 88. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Douglas, J., participated in the decision of this motion before his retirement.
